about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, Delhi based Akg Exim Limited is a company engaged in the business of merchant trading of products and commodities. It is a global merchandiser and distributor of a range of products including Non-Basmati Rice, Spices, Dry Fruits, Metal Scrap, Iron Scrap and Aluminium scrap etc.

AKG exports Metal Scrap from USA & West African Countries and sells it in Far East Countries & in Domestic
markets. The Non-Basmati Rice is purchased from the domestic Market and exported to African Countries.

The company's revenues from operations increased from Rs. 7,468.05 Lacs in 2014-2015 to Rs. 9859.04 Lacs in 2015-16 and further to Rs. 10489 Lacs in F.Y. 2016-17, at the rate of 32.01% and 6.40%.

The Net Profit after tax grew from Rs. 40.71 Lacs in 2014-15 to Rs 48.86 Lacs in 2016-17, at the rate of 18.71%.

The company has 18 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Akg Exim IPO?
faqs.answer:
Akg Exim IPO is a SME IPO of 1780000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.52 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹31 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on September 10, 2018, and closes on September 14, 2018.

Mas Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Akg Exim IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Akg Exim IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Akg Exim IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Akg Exim IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Akg Exim IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Akg Exim IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Akg Exim IPO opens on September 10, 2018 and closes on September 14, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Akg Exim IPO?
faqs.answer: Akg Exim IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Akg Exim IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Akg Exim IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
